replies.body:
What have you done to Asol!
you've taken the one thing. THe ONE THING that made him unique, his DPS dmg pattern through his W and now he's just a boring generic burst mage.
Throw out all your spells and pop people. No need to bother with W now because it's so horrid.
You've ruined this champion. And u won't revert for the asol mains we know that already
Just curious, is there ever going to be a new velkoz skin?
are the Eternals still coming this patch?

The launch of eternals has been pushed back, due to changes with the system:

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/2019/08/dev-changes-to-eternals/
